subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Bob Baffert, the trainer of the Preakness and Haskell winner Lookin at Lucky, said the horse had a fever this week and would not run in the Travers on Aug. 28 at Saratoga.
snippet: Bob Baffert, the trainer of the Preakness and Haskell winner Lookin at Lucky, said the horse had a fever this week and would not run in the Travers on Aug. 28 at Saratoga.
